name: arcaneResearcher
label: Arcane Researcher
description: Whenever you venture into alternate planes of existence or meet entities from other dimensions, you may declare that you have read about this dimension or creature before. Ask the GM what you learned from your past studies.

name: AtAnyCost
label: At any Cost
description: Whenever you truly desire something, you may take +2 to a roll by decreasing Stability (-2).

name: codeOfHonor
label: Code of Honor
description: You abide by a strict code of honor. Decide its nature. Whenever you take risks or make sacrifices for your code of honor, gain Stability (+1).

name: deadShot
label: Dead Shot
description: You are a seasoned marksman. Any Harm you deal with a firearm is considered +1 Harm.

name: desperate
label: Desperate
description: Whenever you try to make it through overwhelming odds, take +1 on all rolls until you're clear of the threat.

name: divineChampion
label: Divine Champion
description: Whenever you fight your deity's enemies or fight to protect a sacred object, you do +1 Harm and take +1 to Endure Injury. If you lose such a battle, your deity becomes irate, and you take -1 ongoing to all actions related to your deity until you have atoned for your failure.

name: eliteSport
label: Elite Sport
description: You've competed professionally in a sport, through which you have received stipends to fund your studies. Choose a sport:

options: Fencing: When using swords, you can make the attack, Riposte [3], [Distance: arm, attack immediately after parrying], and you have a rapier [Stabbing weapon] at home.
Baseball/Cricket/Football/Soccer/Tennis: You take +1 ongoing while running, throwing, or catching objects.
Ice hockey: You take +1 to rolls to Endure Injury against close combat attacks.

name: endureTrauma
label: Endure Trauma
description: You are not as easily affected by trauma as others. Whenever you reduce Stability, you always lose 1 fewer level than normal.

name: eyeForAnEye
label: Eye for an Eye
description: Whenever you suffer a serious or critical injury, name the person you feel is responsible. You get +2 ongoing to all rolls against them, forever. All rolls targeting the person count, but rolls targeting the person's family, friends, minions, and property only count if the GM feels they're applicable.

name: goodSamaritan
label: Good Samaritan
description: Whenever you help another at your own expense, gain Stability (+1).

name: grittedTeeth
label: Gritted Teeth
description: Abuse, violence, self-harm, and assaults have become familiar, and the pain hardly affects you at all anymore. You suffer no penalties from wounds, whether serious or critical.

name: grudge
label: Grudge
description: When someone directly or indirectly ruins your plans, you take +1 ongoing against them until you have taken revenge or received restitution of equal worth to what you lost.

name: hardened
label: Hardened
description: You take +1 ongoing to Endure Injury.

name: jaded
label: Jaded
description: Whenever you roll (10-14) to Keep it Together, you may suppress your emotions and postpone their effects until the next scene.

name: manipulative
label: Manipulative
description: Whenever you do someone a favor or learn one of their secrets, you may later choose one of the options below, by reminding them of your prior services or hint at the secret you know:

options: Take +2 to Influence them.
Take +2 to Hinder them.

name: opportunist
label: Opportunist
description: Whenever you sacrifice someone else to further your own goals, gain Stability (+1).

name: rage
label: Rage
description: When in combat, you may awaken your inner rage. Lose Stability (-1) and mark 1 Rage. Every time you get a wound and every time you defeat a foe, increase Rage (+1). Rage lasts until the end of the combat.During combat, you may spend 1 Rage to choose 1 Edge:

edges: Brutal assault: take +1 Harm to your attack.
Ignore the pain: take +2 to Endure Injury.
Lost in frenzy: shake off and ignore psychological or supernatural influence.

name: sealedFate
label: Sealed Fate (requires the Disadvantage Condemned)
description: Whenever you are dealt a Critical Wound,you may mark 1 Time from Condemned to immediately stabilize the Wound.Whenever you die, mark 2 Time from Condemned and reawaken, injured and weak, but alive. All your Wounds will be stabilized.

name: thirstForKnowledge
label: Thirst for Knowledge
description: Whenever you learn new information about alternate planes of existence, a supernatural entity, or a Higher Power, gain Stability (+1).

name: toTheLastBreath
label: To the Last Breath (requires the Disadvantage Condemned)
description: When you refuse to give in even if the odds turn against you, mark 1 Time to reroll the dice.

name: watchers
label: Watchers
description: You are being watched over and protected by a group of mysterious people who intend on keeping you alive for their own obscure purposes. Whenever you are in mortal danger, you can activate your watchers. If you do, the GM takes 1 Hold. The watchers act as a small/medium/large gang (2/3/3 Harm, 5/10/15 Wounds), dependent on how powerful the threat is. Their sole motivation is to keep you out of harm's reach. The GM can also spend Hold on the watchers' behalf to let them make a Move against you.

name: workaholic
label: Workaholic
description: Whenever you create something or carry out an experiment, gain Stability (+1).

name: worldly
label: Worldly
description: Whenever you arrive at a new location in the mundane world, decide whether you have been here before, and if so, name some detail about the place significant to you. Also, decide if you met someone there and what you left behind. The GM will say what has changed since then.

name: deadlyStare
label: Deadly Stare
description: Whenever you find yourself in a charged situation, roll +Violence:

results.description: You make eye contact with an NPC, causing them to freeze up and be unable to take any actions until you break eye contact. You also get +2 ongoing against your target.
You make eye contact with an NPC, causing them to freeze up and be unable to take any actions until you break eye contact.
Your opponents see you as their primary threat.

name: deathDrive
label: Death Drive
description: Whenever you fight with no regard for your personal safety,roll +Violence:

edges: Eager: Engage an additional hostile in Combat.
Vicious: deal +2 Harm with one attack.
Frantic: get within reach to attack a hostile.
Reckless: frighten your opponents by laughing into the face of death (+1 ongoingduring the fight).

results.description: Get 3 Edges. You may spend them any time during the scene.
Get 2 Edges. You may spend them any time during the scene.
Get 1 Edge, but afterwards you discover you have been injured without noticing it (Endure Injury; the GM determines the amount of Harm based on who attacked you and how).

name: enforcer
label: Enforcer
description: Whenever you credibly threaten someone directly or suggestively, roll +Violence:

results.description: They must decide to either do what you want or defy you with the knowledge that you can execute your threat.
You must give them a third option. Choose one:
options: They offer you something they think you'd rather have.
Retreat from the scene.
They are terrorized; you have +1 ongoing on all rolls against them until they've proven they're not afraid of you.
They attack you from a disadvantaged position. You take +2 on your roll to Engage in Combat if you counterattack.

results.description: Turns out you didn't have the advantage you thought you did. The GM makes a Move.

name: fieldAgent
label: Field Agent
description: You have been trained by an intelligence agency to fight in the field. Whenever you enter combat, roll +Violence:

edges: Take cover: avoid a ranged attack by diving behind an object or a person.
Choke hold: lock a human opponent in a grip they cannot get out of without taking 1 Harm.
Disarm: remove an opponent's weapon in close combat.
Improvised weapon: execute a lethal, close-combat attack with a seemingly innocuous object (Surprise Strike [2] [Distance: arm]).

results.description: Get 3 Edges. You may spend them any time during the scene.
Get 2 Edges. You may spend them any time during the scene.
Get 1 Edge, but you have made a bad call. The GM makes a Move.

name: gangLeader
label: Gang Leader
description: You're the boss of a small gang of criminals. Whenever you give your gang orders that are risky and/or may result in them paying a high price, roll +Violence:

results.description: They enact your orders without question.
They do as you want, but there is a complication (choose one):
options: One of them defies you in front of the others.
They will all be disgruntled for some time.

results.description: Problems arise. Maybe something goes wrong when carrying out your orders, or they doubt your abilities as a leader. The GM makes a Move.

name: intimidating
label: Intimidating
description: There is something about you that instinctively makes others fear you. Whenever you're trying to frighten another person, roll +Violence:

results.description: They succumb to fear and give in to your demands.
They run away from you or give in to you, GM's choice.
They see you as their primary threat and act accordingly. The GM makes a Move for them.

name: lightningFast
label: Lightning Fast
description: Whenever you move unexpectedly fast in combat, roll +Violence:

edges: Dodge: avoid an attack.
Blinding speed: Engage in Combat with every opponent within reach of your weapon as a single attack. If you're attacking with a firearm, this uses up all its ammo.
Uncanny precision: hit your opponent's weak spot. Deal +1 Harm.

results.description: Get 3 Edges. You may spend them any time during the scene.
Get 2 Edges. You may spend them any time during the scene.
Get 1 Edge, but you also end up in a bad spot or face unexpected resistance. The GM makes a Move.

name: martialArtsExpert
label: Martial Arts Expert
description: Whenever you're fighting in close quarters, roll +Violence:

edges: Block: avoid a melee attack.
Roundhouse strike: Engage in Combat against several opponents surrounding you, counting as a single attack.
Disarm: remove an opponent's weapon.
Throw: reposition an opponent or drop them to the ground.

results.description: Get 2 Edges. You may spend them any time during the scene.
Get 1 Edge.
Get 1 Edge, but you underestimate your opponents, who may be more numerous or skilled than you first assumed. The GM makes a Move.

name: officer
label: Officer
description: Whenever you are in combat with at least one ally by your side,roll +Violence:

edges: Attack!: One ally gets +2 to their next roll to Engage in Combat.
Coordinate fire!: All allies get +1 to their next roll to Engage in Combat with firearms while in the fight.
Aim for the head!: You or one of your allies' Engage in Combat deals +1 Harm.
Take cover!: You or an ally receive 2 Armor against a ranged attack.

results.description: Get 3 Edges. You may spend them any time during the scene.
Get 2 Edges. You may spend them any time during the scene.
You misjudge the situation. Choose whether you have put yourself or one of your allies in harm's way. The GM makes a Move for your opponent.

name: ruthless
label: Ruthless
description: Whenever you sacrifice another to save your own skin, roll +Violence:

edges: Human shield: force them to take all the Harm from one attack for you.
Bait: expose someone to danger so you can flank an enemy (deal +1 Harm).
Sacrifice: Leave them to the enemy while you slip away.

results.description: Get 3 Edges. You may spend them any time during the scene.
Get 2 Edges.
Things turns out in a bad way for you instead. The GM makes a Move.

name: sniper
label: Sniper
description: Whenever you fire at a distant target utilizing a scoped rifle, roll +Violence:

options: Deal +1 Harm.
Hit another target as well.
Immobilize your target.
Get the target to lose control of something.
You don't reveal your position.

results.description: The shot finds its target. Choose two options.
The shot finds its target. Choose one option.
The shot didn't go where you intended it to, or you reveal your position to the enemy - expect witnesses, opponents pursuing you as you leave the scene, or other problems. The GM makes a Move.

name: streetfighter
label: Streetfighter
description: Whenever you fight in close combat, roll +Violence:

edges: Dodge: avoid an attack.
Flurry of blows: take +2 on your roll to attack an opponent.
Dirty strike: momentarily stun an opponent by painfully striking them, e.g. on the eye, crotch, or ear.

results.description: Get 3 Edges. You may spend them any time during the scene.
Get 2 Edges, but the GM also gets to pick one complication:
options: You risk losing control during the fight (Keep it Together to prevent it).
You earn an enemy, who will try to get back at you later.

results.description: You're unfocused and lose control. The GM makes a Move.

name: survivalInstinct
label: Survival Instinct
description: Whenever you suffer a serious or critical injury yet refuse to yield, roll +Violence. On a success, you may temporarily ignore the effects of the injuries, but you will need treatment to stabilize them as soon as the time limit expires:

results.description: You ignore your injuries until the conflict is over, as well as choose one:
options: Viciousness: +1 ongoing to Engage in Combat rolls for the remainder of the fight.
Adrenaline rush: +1 ongoing to Endure Injury rolls for the remainder of the fight.

results.description: You ignore your injuries until the conflict is over.
You overexert yourself and after a few moments your injuries cause you to pass out and collapse. After your next action, the GM decides when and how you pass out.

name: artifact
label: Artifact
description: You own a seemingly mundane item, which actually possesses mystical powers. Its powers can be activated through certain methods, such as infusing it with blood or whispering forbidden words (you decide what is required). Whenever you activate the object, roll +Soul:

options: See the true form of a creature or location.
Receive a vision of what threatens you.
Get yourself out of a bind.
Call on the entity bound to the artifact and bargain with them.

results.description: Choose one option (the GM determines what happens).
Choose one option (the GM determines what happens). However, the artifact also exacts an additional price (the GM determines what is required).
The artifact does something unexpected, possibly dangerous. The GM makes a Move.

name: bound
label: Bound
description: You are bound to an extradimensional entity whose powers you can draw upon. Explain what you think it is. At the start of each game session, roll +Soul:

options: See the true form of a creature or location.
Disperse magic targeting you.
Call on the entity.

results.description: You may choose up to three options at any time during the session.
You may choose one option at any time during the session.
You may choose one option at any time during the session, but the GM makes a Move for the entity at some point during the session.

name: charismaticAura
label: Charismatic Aura
description: You radiate an aura that makes people trust you and seek your company. Whenever your aura is truly noticeable, roll +Soul:

options: Catch a stranger's attention. They become curious and approach you.
Change a person's disposition towards you from either aggressive to suspicious, suspicious to neutral, or neutral to positive.
Make opponents perceive you as harmless and ignore you for as long as you remain in the background and do not act against them.

results.description: Choose two separate options.
Choose one option.
Choose one option, but you also attract unwanted attention. The GM makes a Move.

name: contagiousInsanity
label: Contagious Insanity
description: Whenever you allow your madness to infect someone you're speaking with, roll +Soul:

options: Afflict your victim with a temporary psychosis, in which they are haunted by their fears (NPCs only).
Trigger a Disadvantage within another person (PCs only, roll for the Disadvantage).
Affect an additional victim.
Call for creatures of madness to haunt the infected.

results.description: Choose two options.
Choose one option.
Your intended victim's own terrors and Dark Secrets manifest within you, instead. You must Keep it Together.

name: cultLeader
label: Cult Leader
description: Whenever you and your followers perform a ritual, roll +Soul:

options: A creature's true form.
A portal between dimensions.
The cult's enemies.
The purpose of an object.
Your deity's wishes (take +1 to all rolls while fulfilling their wishes).

results.description: Choose to receive up to three visions from the list below.
Choose to receive up to two visions from the list below.

Choose one vision, but the Illusion tears as a result. You may temporarily be transported into another dimension, attract a demonic being's attention, or receive a horrifying omen. The GM makes a Move.

name: dabblerInTheOccult
label: Dabbler in the Occult
description: You know a little of magical rituals, but have never gone beyond performing written instructions. Whenever you attempt to perform a magical ritual from a set of instructions, roll +Soul:

results.description: You perform every step correctly; the ritual works as intended.
You make a minor error. The GM chooses one complication:
options: You do not have working protection against the forces or entities the ritual summons.
The effects of the ritual are slightly different than what you had imagined.
The ritual summons unexpected entities or forces.

results.description: You misunderstand the scripture and perform the ritual with no control whatsoever over the resulting outcome. The GM makes a Move.

name: divine
label: Divine
description: There is something about you that reminds your former servants of what you truly are. Whenever you encounter a monstrous creature, roll +Soul:

options: Soothe an aggressive creature.
Command the creature and force it to obey your order.

results.description: The creature mistakes you for a god. Choose up to three options, useable any time during this scene.
You are fascinating to the creature. Choose one option.
You may choose one option, but after using it the creature becomes determined to possess you. It might try to devour you or perhaps capture you. The GM makes a Move.

name: dreamer
label: Dreamer
description: You are a talented, self-taught dream wanderer. Whenever you want to meet someone or find out the truth about something in the Dream, roll +Soul:

results.description: You meet the intended person or arrive at the specific place in the Dream.
You meet the intended person, or arrive at the specific place. However, some element has changed, or something followed you or the person in question.
You are lost in the Dream and cannot wake up until you find your way back.

name: enhancedAwareness
label: Enhanced Awareness
description: When you focus your senses at a location where the Illusion is weak, roll +Soul. On a success, you have visions about the place and may be able to speak to entities tied to it:

results.description: You can discern clear details regarding the location.
You get some basic impressions regarding the location.

The Illusion tears. The veil is lifted temporarily, revealing an alternate dimension - the GM determines which one. The PC could be sucked into it or something may cross over into our reality. The GM makes a Move.

name: exorcist
label: Exorcist
description: Whenever you perform an exorcism to banish a spirit or extradimensional creature, explain what the ritual looks like and roll +Soul:

options: Nobody is harmed during the ritual.
The entity will not reappear later.
The entity will not become hostile toward you.

results.description: The creature is banished. Choose two options.
The creature is banished. Choose one option.
The creature resists banishment and something goes terribly wrong, such as the creature possessing you. The GM makes a Move.

name: forbiddenInspiration
label: Forbidden Inspiration
description: Whenever you dive deep into your art and allow yourself to be inspired by the Truth, roll +Soul:

options: Enticement: Entice an entity to come to you.
Visions: See Through the Illusion into a specific place of your choice.
Inspiration: Ask the GM if there is anything strange or supernatural about the situation you're in. The answer will be revealed through your art.

results.description: Choose two options.
Choose one option.
You have gazed too deeply into the abyss. Choose one option, but you also experience terrifying visions or encounter something horrible. The GM makes a Move.

name: genius
label: Genius
description: Whenever you find yourself in a life-threatening situation, roll +Soul to see if you can discover a way out:

edges: Logical: You realize an effective way to dispose of the threat. Deal +1 Harm whenever you exploit it.
Quick thinker: You realize how to protect yourself from Harm. Treat it as if you'd rolled a (15+) on Avoid Harm whenever you exploit it.
Rational: You realize how to save yourself by sacrificing someone else. Pick the person you utilize to escape the threat.

results.description: Choose up to three Edges, useable any time in the scene, while you're still in danger.
Choose up to two Edges, useable any time in the scene, while you're still in danger.
Choose one Edge, but you also attract unwanted attention. The GM makes a Move.

name: implantedMessages
label: Implanted Messages
description: Whenever you experiment on a human, you may implant an order into them. Roll +Soul:

results.description: You hold 2 Power over them.

You hold 1 Power over them.For as long as you retain Power over them, they take 1 Serious Wound should they refuse or attempt to go against your order, but this loosens your grip over them by 1 Power. If they fulfill your order, all your remaining Power over them is removed.
Something goes wrong, such as they get hurt in the process or the order's outcome is different than what you imagined. The GM makes a Move.

name: innerPower
label: Inner Power
description: You harbor a mysterious power, which you do not fully understand. The power can protect you, but you have no control over it. Whenever you release your inner power, roll +Soul:

results.description: The power attacks all opponents in your vicinity, causing 2 Harm.
The power attacks your closest opponent, causing 2 Harm.
The power attacks all living beings, including yourself, in the vicinity, causing 2 Harm.

name: layOnHands
label: Lay on Hands
description: You are able to heal others' wounds without using medicine or first aid, but you must channel the injuries onto yourself or another living victim. To transfer the Wound, you must be able to see the victim, but not touch them and they are not required to consent. The wound transferred is of the same type, severity, and condition as the original. Whenever you lay your hands on a seriously or critically wounded person and pray, roll +Soul:

results.description: You fully heal the injured person, channeling the Wound onto yourself or a selected target.
You stabilize the injured, channeling the Wound onto yourself or a selected target.
You may choose to stabilize the injured, but if you do, the powers break free from your control.

name: magneticIntuition
label: Magnetic Intuition
description: You have an innate ability to perceive Kirlian auras and sense the presence of magic. Whenever you utilize your magical intuition, roll +Soul:

options: Learn something about a creature's true nature.
Learn if something has a magical nature.
Learn where the Illusion is weakest towards other dimensions.

results.description: Choose up to three options. Up to two may be saved until later this scene.
Choose up to two options. One may be saved until later this scene.
Choose one option, but you also get an unexpected vision or attract attention. The GM makes a Move.

name: magneticAttraction
label: Magnetic Attraction
description: Whenever you attract everyone's attention, roll +Soul:

options: People forget what they're doing and can do nothing but stare at you.
Draw someone to you.
Get someone to do what you ask.

results.description: Choose up to three options. You may save up to two until later in the scene.
Choose one option.
Choose one option, but someone present becomes obsessed, wanting to have you, keep you, and own you for themselves. The GM makes a Move.

name: sixthSense
label: Sixth Sense
description: You have an intuition for things, both good and bad. At the start of each game session, roll +Soul:

options: Act first in a threatening situation. This can include even acting prior to a surprise attack.
Sense whether someone wishes good or ill towards you.
Discover or sense a clue or lead when you're off track.

results.description: Choose up to three options, useable any time during the session.
Choose up to two options, useable any time during the session.
Your instincts will fail to trigger in a dangerous situation. The GM makes a Move at some point during the session.

name: snakeCharmer
label: Snake Charmer
description: Whenever you perform your chosen art form for an intelligent, monstrous creature, roll +Soul to awaken a desire within them:

options: Ask the creature for help with a problem.
Ask the creature for something you desire.

results.description: Choose one option immediately, and you may choose up to two more any time in the future.
Choose one option.
The desire is beyond the creature's ability to regulate. It cannot help but attempt to devour or imprison you.

name: stubborn
label: Stubborn
description: Whenever you push yourself to the limit to overcome a threat, roll +Soul:

edges: Refuse to give up: Postpone the effects of a critical injury until you have made it out of the threat's reach.
Will over skill: Roll +Willpower instead of the normal attribute whenever you avoid or fight whatever is threatening you.
Steel yourself: Break free from a supernatural effect.

results.description: Get 3 Edges. You may spend them any time during the scene.
Get 2 Edges. You may spend them any time during the scene.
Get 1 Edge, but you push yourself past your breaking point. Decrease Stability (-2).

name: voiceOfInsanity
label: Voice of Insanity
description: Whenever you manipulate a crowd, roll +Soul:

options: Attract other people to join in the crowd.
Have crowd members give you all their valuables.
Unite the crowd to fight for you.
Incite the crowd into an orgy of unbridled emotion: sexual lust, anger, sorrow, violence, generosity, or celebrating, depending on what concepts you are instilling into them.
Have the crowd disperse and calmly return to their normal lives.

results.description: Choose up to three options, useable any time during this scene.
Choose up to two options, useable any time during this scene.
Choose one option, useable any time during this scene. However, the crowd becomes uncontrollable and volatile, and cannot be dispersed. The GM makes a Move.

name: voiceOfPain
label: Voice of Pain
description: The first time you are seriously or critically wounded by an opponent's attack, you can gain insight from your pain. Roll +Soul:

options: You realize how to get through your opponent's defenses (take +1 to Engage in Combat with them).
You find your opponent's weak spot (deal +1 Harmwhenever you Engage in Combat with them).
You perceive your opponent's pattern of attack (take +1 to Avoid Harm whenever they attack you).These effects are permanent against this opponent.

results.description: You get two options.
Choose one option.
Choose one option, but the pain will overwhelm you eventually and make you black out.

name: wayfinder
label: Wayfinder
description: Whenever you travel between two places in the city and allow your madness to guide you through the alleys, roll +Soul:

results.description: You discover a shortcut through the alleys, which takes you to your destination within a few minutes, regardless of how far the distance actually is.
You discover a shortcut, but there is also some sort of obstacle you will need to get past.
You discover a shortcut, but it leads you into a dangerous situation, such as the lair of some creature or an ambush set by some gang. The GM makes a Move.

name: analyst
label: Analyst
description: Whenever you Investigate something, you may also choose from these additional questions:

questions: Which organizations, groups, or people of interest may be connected to this?
Is there a connection between this and another event?
What could a plausible motive be?

name: battlefieldMedicine
label: Battlefield Medicine
description: Whenever you stabilize an injured person's wounds, even if you don't have access to medical equipment, roll +Reason:

options: Improvisation: You stabilize one Wound without access to medical equipment.
Effective: You stabilize two Wounds instead of one.
Careful: The wound stabilizes and will heal much faster than normal.

results.description: Choose two options.
You may choose one option. However, you must also choose one complication:
options: You leave cosmetic scars or defects (the patient loses Stability (-2).
There are lingering side effects (-1 to all rolls the wound could feasibly affect until it's fully healed).
The patient remains knocked out until the GM determines that they awaken.

results.description: You stabilize the wound, even without access to medical equipment, but there are also unexpected and potentially dangerous consequences, such as infections, healing deformities, or other serious side effects. The GM makes a Move.

name: collector
label: Collector
description: Whenever you search for an unusual or rare item, roll +Reason:

results.description: You know exactly where the item is, how to acquire it, and how to minimize hazards, obstacles, and/or costs.
You know roughly where it is and what hazards, obstacles, and/or costs are associated with acquiring it.
You know roughly where to start searching for it, but not the hazards or costs involved in pursuing it.

name: crimeSceneInvestigator
label: Crime Scene Investigator
description: Whenever you investigate a crime scene, roll +Reason and ask questions from the list below:

questions: What was the chain of events?
What can I assume about the perpetrator?
Which mistakes did the perpetrator make?
When was the crime committed?
When was someone here last?
Does the crime remind me of something I am familiar with already and, if so, what?
Who might know more about the crime?

results.description: Ask two questions.
Ask one question.
Ask one question, but your investigation leads you into danger or introduces additional problems later on.

name: dataRetrieval
label: Data Retrieval
description: Whenever you look for information on a subject in a library, research archive, or on the Internet, roll +Reason. In response to the inquiries you make, the GM will tell you what you uncover, in as much detail as can be expected from the source you have utilized:

questions: What is its origin?
What is it meant for?
How does it work?
What do I have to watch out for?
How can I stop or destroy this?

results.description: Ask three questions.
Ask two questions.
Ask one question, but you also discover something unexpected. The GM makes a Move.

name: expert
label: Expert
description: You are an expert in certain fields of knowledge. Whenever you Investigate something associated with one of your chosen fields, you always get to ask one additional question, regardless of the outcome, and may ask any questions you want. Choose two areas of expertise:

options: Archeology
Economics
History
Comparative literature
Psychology
Sociology
Theology
(Other)

name: explosivesExpert
label: Explosives Expert
description: You can build / disarm bombs. If you have enough time and resources, you can build any kind of bomb you like. However, whenever you're building an improvised bomb under time pressure / tryeing to disarm one, roll +Reason:

results.description: You construct a functional bomb / The bomb is deactivated.

The bomb's blast potential is lower than usual (decrease Harm dealt by -1) / Complications arise. Maybe you can't completely turn it off, just delay the timer, weaken the explosive effect, or something else turns up and makes thing worse.

The bomb is unpredictable. Maybe it doesn't detonate, detonates prematurely, or it is more powerful and volatile than expected. The GM makes a Move / Fuck, that's not good! The bomb may go off in your hands, the timer starts counting down from 10, 9, 8, 7…, or even bigger problems occur. The GM makes a Move.

name: hacker
label: Hacker
description: Whenever you penetrate digital networks in the pursuit of confidential data, crack software, or disable security systems,roll +Reason:

results.description: You accomplish your task without a problem.
Complications arise. Choose one option:
options: Someone discovers the intrusion. You must take risks or compromise on how much you're able to accomplish.
You leave traces of your intrusion.

results.description: Unbeknownst to you, your intrusion didn't work out as you wanted. Maybe you didn't succeed at your task as well as you imagined, or you may have been discovered by personal enemies, law enforcement, or something else lurking in the network. The GM makes a Move.

name: inventor
label: Inventor
description: Whenever you are about to create or repair something, explain what you are about to do. The GM will tell you what you need to succeed, and once you have collected these materials, you may roll +Reason:

options: Durable: The construction can be used multiple times and doesn't break easily.
Effective: The construction confers +1 on rolls where it is used for its intended purpose.
Lethal: The construction causes +1 Harm.
Protective: The construction confers +1 armor.

results.description: The construction is successful and you may pick two options from below.
The construction has minor flaws. You may choose one option from below.
You complete the construction or repair, but it has significant flaws, some of which are hidden. The GM makes a Move.

name: manhunter
label: Manhunter
description: Whenever you're out to get information about someone, roll +Reason:

questions: What is their background?
What or who do they love most of all?
Who do they surround themselves with, like, and/or trust?
Where are they located right now?
How can I best gain access to them?

results.description: Ask the GM three questions from the list below.
Ask the GM two questions from the list below.
Ask the GM one question from the list below, but someone figures out you've been snooping around.

name: occultLibrary
label: Occult Library
description: Whenever you are in your library researching the supernatural, roll +Reason:

questions: Which higher power does this have connections to?
What do I need, or need to do, to exorcise or control this being?
Which dimension is this associated with?
What must I do to protect myself from this?

results.description: Ask the GM two questions from the list below.
Ask the GM one question from the list below.
Ask the GM one question from the list below, but you have missed or overlooked something crucial. The GM takes 1 Hold, which can be spent at any time to make a hard or soft Move.

name: occultStudies
label: Occult Studies
description: You are a student of the occult. Upon coming in contact with a magical discipline, entity, or phenomenon for the first time,roll +Reason:

options: I know something about this (ask the GM what you know and take +1 ongoing while acting on the answers during this scene).
I know where I can find more information about this (ask the GM where).

results.description: Take both options below.
Choose one option.
You have a hazy memory of something like this, but can't say for sure if it's true or not. The GM explains what it is you remember.

name: prepared
label: Prepared
description: Whenever you investigate a location prior to visiting it, roll +Reason:

options: Find or create a map of the location.
Uncover any security systems and other obstacles.
Pinpoint the location of something you're after.

results.description: Choose three options.
Choose two options.
Choose one option, but you have missed or overlooked something crucial. The GM takes 1 Hold, which can be spent at any time to make a hard or soft Move for the location.

name: puppeteer
label: Puppeteer
description: Whenever you execute a plan using other people as pawns,roll +Reason:

results.description: Everyone involved takes +1 ongoing to carry out the plan, and you get one Experience if the plan is successful.
You get one Experience if the plan is successful, but you have overlooked or miscalculated something.
Your plan is inadequate, revealed, and/or misguided. The GM makes a Move.

name: quickThinker
label: Quick Thinker
description: Whenever you commence a dangerous mission, roll +Reason:

options: Remember something that's advantageous in a negotiation. Ask the GM what it is.
You possess some equipment you can use to get out of a sticky situation. Ask the GM what it is.
You have special field training that would be useful in getting past one of your obstacles. Ask the GM what it is.

results.description: Choose up to three options, at any time during the mission.
Choose up to two options, at any time during the mission.
At any time during the mission, choose one option, but you've failed to account for something. The GM makes a Move.

name: scientist
label: Scientist
description: Whenever you Investigate an object or entity using the proper equipment, you may choose from these following questions, in addition to those acquired through investigation:

questions: What properties does this have? (take +1 to any rollsagainst entities or objects of a similar type next time you encounter it).
How do I make use of this? (take +1 to any rolls associated with using the object).
What is its purpose?

name: tracer
label: Tracer
description: Whenever you utilize your intelligence networks to trace someone or something, roll +Reason:

questions: Where in the world was this seen last?
What people have associated themselves with what I'm looking for lately?
What tracks and marks has it left behind?
Who else is trying to find what I'm looking for?

results.description: Ask up to three of the questions below.
Ask up to two of the questions below.
Ask one of the questions, but someone notices you snooping around. It might be someone you'd rather not be known by, or a traitor inside your network.

name: shadow
label: Shadow
description: When shadowing someone / want to lose someone shadowing you, roll +Perception:

results.description: You avoid discovery, follow your target all the way to their final destination, and learn something about them you can use to your advantage later / You shake your pursuers and can choose to try to shadow them instead.
You avoid discovery and follow your target to their final destination / You shake your pursuers.

You are spotted or encounter some sort of problem along the way. The GM makes a Move / Your pursuers are still on your tail, and they can set up an ambush, disappear without a trace (only to show up when you least expect it), or refuse to go away. The GM makes a Move.

name: accessTheDarkNet
label: Access the Dark Net
description: Whenever you search the Dark Net for forbidden information, rare items, or myths, roll +Perception:

results.description: You discover what you're looking for, and may also choose one option:
options: You discover a portal to another dimension, and a path you can trace back to it later.
You make contact with someone - or something - who can help you, for the right price.
You find something valuable or important, in addition to what you were looking for. The GM will tell you what it is.

results.description: You find what you're looking for, but you're also exposed to repulsive and frightening stimuli. You must Keep it Together to see how it affects you.
You find what you're after, but also contact something very dangerous. It might attempt to latch onto you or follow you back into reality. The GM makes a Move.

name: bodyAwareness
label: Body Awareness
description: Your body and mind are as one. Whenever you perform acrobatic or agile feats, roll +Perception:

options: Escape bindings or restraints.
Get past an obstacle (creature or object).
Get into or make it through a space you normally wouldn't be able to.

results.description: Choose one option.
Choose one option, but you expose yourself to danger or incur a cost.
Choose one option, but something goes very wrong. The GM makes a Move.

name: daredevil
label: Daredevil
description: Whenever you're entering a dangerous situation, roll +Perception:

edges: Keep your eyes open: Discover a threat before it discovers you.
Get out of the way: Avoid an attack.
Get the jump on them: Harm your opponent before they can react.

results.description: Choose three Edges. You may spend them anytime during the scene.
Choose two Edges. You may spend them anytime during the scene.
Choose one Edge, but you are in over your head. The GM makes a Move.

name: exitStrategy
label: Exit Strategy
description: Whenever you have killed someone covertly and leave the scene of the murder, roll +Perception:

options: You leave the scene of the murder unnoticed and reach a safe spot of your choosing in the vicinity. Describe how.
You have left no clues that can be traced back to you.
The body is well hidden and will not be found for quite some time.

results.description: You get all three options below.
Choose two of the options below.
Choose one option, but you risk discovery or face unexpected obstacles. The GM makes a Move.

name: eyeForDetail
label: Eye for Detail
description: Whenever you have had time to study somebody for a while, roll +Perception:

questions: Where are you from?
Are you capable of violence?
How could I seduce or tempt you?
Why are you here?
What are you working on?

results.description: Ask three questions from the list below.
Ask two questions from the list below.
Ask one question from the list below, but you expose your inquisitiveness to the person you're observing. The GM makes a Move.

name: hunter
label: Hunter
description: Whenever you are hunting someone or something, roll +Perception:

options: Set up an ambush for your enemy (deal your weapon's Harm).
Camouflage (take +2 to Act Under Pressure while you are hiding).
Move in shadows (take +2 to Avoid Harmdealt with a ranged weapon).

results.description: Get three options. You may spend them anytime during this scene.
Get two options. You may spend them anytime during this scene.
Get one option, but you become the prey. The GM makes a Move.

name: instinct
label: Instinct
description: Whenever you Observe a Situation and act on the GM's answers, take +2 instead of +1.

name: keenEyed
label: Keen-Eyed
description: Whenever you Observe a Situation, you may choose from these questions, in addition to the ones normally acquired:

questions: What weaknesses do they have I can use to my advantage?
What strengths do they have I should watch out for?

name: readACrowd
label: Read a Crowd
description: Whenever you move through a small crowd to gather information, roll +Perception. Examples of a 'small crowd' include a party, bar/restaurant, or an office. You decide what specific information you are looking for, as long as it makes sense for the crowd to possess such information:

questions: Who here has information I want?
Where can I find what I am looking for?
Who is watching me?
Is there anything else of interest?

results.description: Ask three questions.
Ask two questions, but you also draw unwanted attention to yourself.
Ask one question, but you've blown your cover. Those who have what you're looking for will be expecting you. The GM makes a Move.

name: survivalist
label: Survivalist
description: Whenever you utilize your survivalist skills, roll +Perception:

options: Find water and something edible.
Make it past an environmental obstacle.
Find a safe spot to hide and rest.

results.description: Choose up to three options, useable while you remain in this situation.
Choose up to two options, useable while you remain in this situation.
Choose one option useable while you remain in this situation, but you've also overlooked something important. The GM makes a Move.

name: wanderer
label: Wanderer
description: Whenever you are heading out to a community or another part of the city, roll +Perception:

options: Ask the GM one question about this place.
You have a contact at this place who could help you, with a bit of convincing.
You have a hideout here, where you can put your head down and get some rest.
You know something about this place. Tell the others what.

results.description: You have been here before. Choose two options any time during your visit.
You have heard of this place. Choose one option any time during your visit.
You have been here before, but something bad happened. Choose one option any time during your visit. The GM explains what kind of problem awaits you here and makes a Move.

name: animalSpeaker
label: Animal Speaker
description: You are able to understand and control animals. Whenever you attempt to control an animal, roll +Intuition:

options: Make the animal go against its instincts.
Make the animal follow you.
Make the animal protect you against an attacker.

results.description: Choose three options. You may save up to two for later.
Choose two options. You may save one for later.
Choose one option, but the animal is affected by your memories and Disadvantages. The GM makes a Move.

name: chameleon
label: Chameleon
description: Whenever you imitate another's appearance or conceal your own identity to trick someone, roll +Intuition:

results.description: Your disguise is convincing, as long as you keep the act going.
You manage to trick everyone who doesn't examine you in detail, but choose one complication:
options: You can't keep this deception up for very long. You must act fast, if you don't want to risk getting exposed.
You leave traces and clues behind, which can be connected to you later on.

results.description: Your disguise is only effective at a distance. If you attract any attention to yourself, you will be exposed.

name: characterActor
label: Character Actor
description: Whenever you try to blend into a place or crowd by adapting your appearance and behavior to the others present, roll +Intuition:

options: Placate someone who is becoming suspicious.
Get access to a place outsiders aren't allowed to go.
Get someone to tell you about this place's secrets.
Get someone's assistance with something here.

results.description: Choose three options. You may save up to two for later.
Choose two options. You may save one for later.
Choose one option, but things don't go according to plan. The GM makes a Move.

name: crafty
label: Crafty
description: Whenever you manipulate an NPC in a longer conversation, roll +Intuition:

options: They become suspicious of someone else of your choosing.
They view you as their ally, for as long as you don't betray them (+1 to all rolls against them).
They willingly do a favor for you.

results.description: Choose up to two options. You may save one until later during this scene.
Choose one option.
They're on to you. The GM makes a Move.

name: extortionist
label: Extortionist
description: Whenever you Read a Person, you may choose from these questions in addition to the usual ones:

questions: What are you afraid of?
What is precious to you?

name: interrogator
label: Interrogator
description: Whenever you Read a Person and mention a name, person, or object, you may always ask "Are you lying?" This doesn't count towards the number of questions you're allowed to normally ask.

name: intuitive
label: Intuitive
description: You can sense people's motives through subconscious readings of their body language, word choices, and behavior. Whenever you Read a Person, you may always ask one additional question, regardless of the outcome of your roll.

name: observant
label: Observant
description: Whenever you Read a Person, you may choose from these questions in addition to the usual ones:

questions: What sort of person are you?
Is there anything odd about you?

name: vigilant
label: Vigilant
description: Whenever you Read a Person, you may choose from these questions in addition to the usual ones:

questions: Are you hiding anything from me?
How do you really feel about me?

name: aceUpTheSleeve
label: Ace up the Sleeve
description: Whenever someone's got you up against the wall or in a tight spot, roll +Coolness:

edges: You have a small, concealed lethal weapon (stiletto or similar), which you can produce unnoticed.
You realize your opponent has a weakness you can exploit (take +2 to your next roll, if it involves exploiting the weakness). Ask the GM what it is.
You spot a way out. Ask the GM what it is. Take +2 to your next roll to make use of it.

results.description: Get 2 Edges. You may spend them any time during the scene.
Get 1 Edge. You may spend it at any time during the scene.
Get 1 Edge, but the situation is worse than you imagined. The GM makes a Move.

name: backstab
label: Backstab
description: Whenever you attack someone who's unprepared for it, roll +Coolness:

options: Aim for the sensitive parts: Deal +1 Harm.
Knock out: The NPC is rendered unconcious. PCs roll to Endure Injury and become neutralized on a (-9).
Careful: You act soundlessly and, if your victim dies, you leave no clues or traces behind.

results.description: Choose two options.
Choose one option.
You expose your betrayal and your target gets to react to your attack as usual. The GM makes a Move.

name: boss
label: Boss
description: You have five to ten criminal henchmen who are loyal to you, usually for as long as you continue paying them. Whenever you send your henchmen to do a risky job, roll +Coolness:

results.description: They follow your orders and everything goes according to plan.
They follow your orders, but GM picks one option:
options: Someone got into trouble.
The job isn't done, and needs something else to be completed.
There will be repercussions later on.

results.description: The GM decides what went wrong, and whether it's immediately evident or will become apparent later on. The GM makes a Move.

name: burglar
label: Burglar
description: Whenever you make use of your expertise in breaking and entering, roll +Coolness:

options: You silently open a locked door within a few moments.
You neutralize an alarm.
You bust a lockbox or safe in less than two minutes.
You avoid being discovered by someone.
Trick someone into believing you belong here (e.g., pretend you're a security guard) for a limited time.

results.description: Get three options. You may spend them any time during the scene.
Get two options. You may spend them any time during the scene.
Get one option, but a problem arises. The GM makes a Move.

name: driver
label: Driver
description: You are a trained professional at operating motor vehicles (car or motorcycle). Whenever you drive your vehicle under pressure and in dangerous situations, roll +Coolness:

edges: Make a risky maneuver to get out of the way.
Shake off one pursuing vehicle.
Use your vehicle as a weapon against a pedestrian (2/3/4 Harm depending on speed).
Sideswipe another vehicle off the road.

results.description: Gain 3 Edges. You may spend them anytime during the scene.
Gain 2 Edges. You may spend them anytime during the scene.

Gain 1 Edge to spend any time during the scene, but the situation worsens somehow - maybe you speed past a police car, additional vehicles start pursuing you, or you or your vehicle is damaged. The GM makes a Move.

name: escapeArtist
label: Escape Artist
description: You are a master at slipping away when the shit hits the fan. Whenever you need to escape a dangerous situation, outline your plan and roll +Coolness:

results.description: You escape without complications.
You can choose to stay or escape at a cost, such as leaving something important behind or take something traceable with you. The GM decides what it is.
You are only half out the door when you're caught in a really bad spot. The GM makes a Move.

name: fastTalk
label: Fast Talk
description: Whenever you talk to an NPC to get their attention, roll +Coolness:

options: Prevent the NPC from noticing something in her immediate vicinity.
Get the NPC to disclose something important (the GM will provide the details).
Distract the NPC. You take +1 to your next roll against them.

results.description: Choose two options.
Choose one option.
Choose one option, but they grow suspicious of your motives. The GM makes a Move.

name: iceCold
label: Ice Cold
description: You keep your calm and cool, even in the midst of violence and chaos. Whenever you are in a violent conflict, roll +Coolness:

edges: Avoid an attack.
Manage to snatch something.
Maneuver into a better position.
Put someone in a bad position (everyone gets +2 to any attack Moves).

results.description: Get 3 Edges. You may spend them any time during the scene.
Get 2 Edges. You may spend them any time during the scene.
Get 1 Edge, but you attract attention from the hostiles. The GM makes a Move.

name: improviser
label: Improviser
description: Whenever you attempt to get out of a dangerous situation by winging it, roll +Coolness:

options: Come up with a convincing lie.
Find something you can use as a makeshift weapon (2 Harm chop/stab/crush).
Hide from a pursuer.
Set a trap that gives you a surprise advantage (+2 to your first attack Move).

results.description: Choose two options.
Choose one option.
Your improvisation makes the situation worse. The GM makes a Move.

name: parkour
label: Parkour
description: You are deft at running and jumping, even over difficult terrain. Whenever you execute acrobatic maneuvers, roll +Coolness:

options: Scale a seemingly impossible obstacle.
Make a seemingly life-threatening leap without suffering Harm.
Successfully avoid a threat.

results.description: Choose two options. You may save one until later.
Choose one option.
Choose one option, but a complication, cost, or new threat emerges. The GM makes a Move.

name: sneak
label: Sneak
description: Whenever you keep hidden and try to avoid drawing attention to yourself, roll +Coolness:

options: Find a secure hiding spot for a while.
Find an alternate route to avoid encountering people.
Bypass a security system or other obstacle without being noticed.

results.description: Get 2 options. You may spend them any time during the scene.
Get 1 option. You may spend them any time during the scene.
Get 1 option, but you manage to attract someone's attention. The GM makes a Move.

name: weaponMasterGunplay
label: Weapon Master: Gunplay
description: You are a master of gunplay.

options: Two shots in the chest and one in the head [4], [Distance: room, -2 ammo]
Disarm [1], [Distance: room, -1 ammo, a targeted PC must Act Under Pressure]

name: weaponMasterArmedCombat
label: Weapon Master: Armed combat
description: You are a master of armed combat.

options: Launching attack [2], [Distance: room]
Precision attack [2], [Distance: arm, ignores armor]
Tripping attack [2], [Distance: arm, targets falls prone]

name: academicNetwork
label: Academic Network
description: You have academic contacts at universities around the world. When it would be useful to know someone at a university, provide the person's name, field of study, and how you got to know one another, then roll +Charisma:

results.description: The person is a friend (Relation +1).
The person is an acquaintance (Relation +0).
You know one another, but there is an old enmity between the two of you (Relation +0).

name: artisticTalent
label: Artistic Talent
description: Whenever you perform your chosen art form or show your works to an audience, roll +Charisma to influence your audience at any time during the scene:

options: They want to see more of your art.
They are affected by the emotion you wanted to convey (e.g., anger, sorrow, fear, joy, lust, etc).
They look up to you (take +1 ongoing with the audience during this scene).
Their attention is fixed entirely on you throughout your performance.

results.description: Choose up to two options any time during the scene.
Choose one option any time during the scene.
Choose one option, but a complication/threat manifests. The GM makes a Move.

name: authority
label: Authority
description: You're an academic authority in your field and a well-known name in newspapers, debate shows, and scientific journals.At the beginning of each game session, roll +Charisma:

options: Influence someone who has heard of your authority in your academic field, as if you had rolled a (15+).
Gain access to a university's resources, such as their facilities, researchers, or scientific archives.
Make a statement about something or someone in mass media.
Gain access to people or places under the pretense of engaging in your research or studies.

results.description: During this game session, choose up to three options.
During this game session, choose up to two options.

During this game session you may choose one option, but you also attract unwanted attention like stalkers, professional adversaries, competitors, or hostile forces. The GM makes a Move for them at some point during the session.

name: aweInspiring
label: Awe-Inspiring
description: Whenever you make a show of being the boss, roll +Charisma:

results.description: People around you accept you as their leader and listen to you. Take +1 ongoing against people in this scene.
People feel you're leadership material and show you respect. Choose one of them, in particular, who goes along with what you think. You have +1 ongoing against them during this scene.
People feel like you're the leader, but one of them tries to challenge you for it. The GM makes a Move.

name: eliteEducation
label: Elite Education
description: You have attended one of the world's most prestigious institutes of higher learning and have acquired contacts with power and influence. Whenever you ask your contacts for a favor, roll +Charisma:

options: Gain a favor from a country's administration (e.g., released from jail, skip a customs check, or get help from the police).
Gain access to a location unavailable to the public.
Locate or track a hidden or missing person.
Receive both the means to escape and a safe hiding spot.

results.description: Choose up to three options.
Choose up to two options.
Choose one option, but you've become indebted to someone. The debt can be called in during the story, whenever the GM chooses.

name: erotic
label: Erotic
description: Whenever you make moves to attract an NPC to you, roll +Charisma:

options: The person must have you, and will abandon their normally reasonable behavior to do so.
The person is distracted by you for as long as you're in the vicinity, unable to concentrate on anything else.
The person becomes jealous of anyone competing for your attention, and tries to dispose of them by any means necessary.
You make them uncertain and confused. You take +1 ongoing against them during this scene.

results.description: Choose up to three options any time during this scene.
Choose up to two options any time during this scene.
Choose one option any time during this scene, but the nature of the attraction is different than you had hoped. The GM makes a Move.

name: fascination
label: Fascination
description: Whenever you use your art to seduce an NPC, roll +Charisma:

options: They are attracted to you.
They forget their woes when experiencing your art.
They are totally captivated by your art and forget all about their surrounding environment.

results.description: Choose one option.
Choose one option, but the GM also chooses one of the following:
options: They become obsessed with you.
They want you right now.

results.description: They are affected by you in a way you didn't anticipate, or the attraction is uncomfortably strong - you choose. The GM makes a Move.

name: forkedTongue
label: Forked Tongue
description: Whenever you manipulate someone, roll +Charisma:

results.description: Choose one option:
options: They trust you (PC takes +1 Relation with you).
They're spellbound by you (take +1 ongoing against them during this scene).
They reveal a weakness, which you can exploit later.

results.description: Choose one option from the list above, but there's also a complication, chosen by the GM or player:
options: They see you as a friend they can turn to when in need.
They fall in love with you.
They will feel betrayed, spurned, humiliated, or manipulated whenever you abuse their trust in you.

results.description: They see right through you and will act as they please.

name: impostor
label: Impostor
description: You maintain relationships with numerous people who all believe you are their soulmate, yet are unaware of each other. Whenever you need money, a safehouse, protection, or other help one of your victims can provide, describe who they are and roll +Charisma:

results.description: They can provide you with whatever you require.
One of them might be able to help, but it will take some convincing.
You know someone who can help, but they have already seen through your game. If you want their assistance it will require threats or blackmail to get them to provide it.

name: influentialFriends
label: Influential Friends
description: You have friends with power and influence. Whenever you need to acquire an object, gain access to a restricted location, or meet a specific person, roll +Charisma:

results.description: Your friends can arrange for what you want.
They can arrange for it, but you have to repay the favor later.
They arrange for what you want, but you get on a powerful person's bad side or attract negative publicity. The GM makes a Move

name: moles
label: Moles
description: You have placed a number of moles in groups or organizations of interest to you, such as business competitors, governments, or cults. Whenever you make contact with one of your moles to acquire info or services, explain what group or organization the mole belongs to, name them, and then roll +Charisma:

options: The mole has penetrated the organization's inner circle; however, their influence is limited.
The mole owes you one; however, you must meet their demands to get what you want.

results.description: You receive both options below.
Choose one of the options below.
The mole's loyalties are questionable. Can you trust them? The GM makes a Move.

name: networkOfContacts
label: Network of Contacts
description: Whenever you check in with your contacts regarding an individual of your choosing, roll +Charisma:

questions: What resources do they have at their disposal?
Who do they have business dealings with?
Where can I find them?
What do they want?
What are they most afraid of losing?

results.description: You may ask three questions from the list below.
You may ask two questions from the list below.
You may ask one question from the list below, but the person you're inquiring about finds out you're snooping around. The GM makes a Move.

name: notorious
label: Notorious
description: You are famous in your trade. Whenever you encounter someone who has likely heard about you, roll +Charisma:

results.description: They know of your reputation; you can decide what they have heard. The GM will have them act accordingly. You take +2 to your next roll to Influence them.
They know of your reputation; you can decide what they have heard.
They know of your reputation; the GM decides what they have heard.

name: perpetualVictim
label: Perpetual Victim
description: Whenever you appear defenseless during a dangerous experience, roll +Charisma:

options: Make someone want to take care of you.
Make an aggressive person want to not harm you.
Make someone confide in you.

results.description: Choose three options. You may save up to two options for use later during the scene.
Choose one option.
Someone tries to take advantage of you and your position. The GM makes a Move.

name: seducer
label: Seducer
description: You can consciously make people fall in love with you. NPCs who fall in love with you cannot oppose you, as long as you haven't expended all your options. Whenever you have an intimate moment with someone, roll +Charisma:

pc: Make them feel bad for opposing you (they must Keep it Together)
They feel happy in your presence, and gain Stability (+2).
options: Give you something you want.
Reveal a secret.
Fight to protect you.

results.description: Choose up to three options, useable any time in the story.
Choose up to two options, useable any time in the story.
Choose one option, useable any time in the story, but you also develop feelings for the person. Increase your Relation to them by +1.

name: streetContacts
label: Street Contacts
description: You have contacts among the homeless, crazies, and other societal outsiders and outcasts. Whenever you need to know something and check in with your contacts, roll +Charisma:

questions: What do you know about the [building/person/organization/event]?
What rumors are circulating on the street at the moment?
How can I get into [location]?
Who in this city would know more about this supernatural thing?

results.description: Ask up to three questions.
Ask one question.
Ask one question, but someone becomes suspicious or aggressive. The GM makes a Move.

name: streetwise
label: Streetwise
description: Whenever you want to acquire items or services from the criminal underworld, roll +Charisma:

results.description: No problem - you get what you're after. Someone will fix you right up.
The GM chooses one option:
options: It will cost you something extra, such as in-kind services, tasks, or an inflated price.
You can get it handled, but only by dealing with someone you're already indebted to.
"Shit, I had one, but I just let it go to [insert name] - maybe you can buy it from her?"
"Sorry, that's a bit outside of my area, but maybe this will work instead?"

results.description: You think you find what you're looking for, but there will be costly stipulations, considerable flaws, or major complications. The GM makes a Move.
